ValidationRule.description: Check to see if the Bill To Account has the correct email format for Bill_To_Email__c fields (64 chars limit) has the correct format and no invalid after the suffix '.'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY), OR( AND( LEN(Bill_To_Account__r.Bill_To_Email__c) > 0, NOT(REGEX(UPPER(Bill_To_Account__r.Bill_To_Email__c),"^[A-Z0-9._%+-/!#$%&'*=?^_`{|}~]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z]{2,}$")) ), LEN(Bill_To_Account__r.Bill_To_Email__c) > 64 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid email address format. Please check the fields 'Requestor Buyer email', 'Bill To Email', and 'Ship To Email' under the Bill To Account. (64-chars limit and no invalid characters after the suffix '.')
